attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This test needs to be scrapped as it is of no use apart from raising money.  The fact is that a vehicle can be put through its MOT, and pass, and you can still be pulled over two minutes after leaving the test centre and charged with having an unroadworthy vehicle.  At present the MOT is not worth the paper it is printed on.
